message: Issue resolved, system is operating normally.

incident.impactSummary: A previously ongoing issue has been resolved. Prior impact unknown.
actionItems: Quantify total impact on downstream internal services.
Confirm stability of the rolled-back environment.
Monitor user rejoin rate and confirm restoration of data access.
Determine root cause of mobile pouring failure.
Develop and deploy fix for acknowledged bug.
Verify the scope and replication of the rating system failure.
Engage relevant engineering team to debug the ratings microservice/API.
Develop and test patch for faulty logic
Monitor progress of equipping mechanic maintenance.

postmortemPlan.summary: Standard review of maintenance procedure effectiveness.

timeline.event: System rollback pushed following unsuccessful fix attempt.
Confirmed root cause: External Roblox API down, preventing data access.
Rollback pushed and completed following a fix.
Report received that Roblox API dependency was unavailable.
Bug acknowledged: mobile pouring functionality confirmed not working.
Internal bug reported and investigation started.
Received confirmation message indicating incident status is 'fixed'.
Initial report received regarding failure of the 5-star rating component.
Incident resolved and system status updated.
Bug identified regarding specific item (drink/shaker) return logic.
Bug regarding product delivery mechanism identified.
Maintenance activity initiated by support teams.
